value.name: Federal judge rules Columbus police cannot use pepper spray, tear gas on nonviolent protesters
value.description: A federal judge granted a preliminary injunction Friday against Columbus police, ordering them to stop using many ways of "non-lethal force" against nonviolent protesters.
